channel.title: Bridging Connections - 360.
channel.description:
Hi. :slight_smile:
I've tried to bridge connections so that I can get online through the 360. But it won't let me bridge connections:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Now, I cannot find any other way to do this, So, can anyone out there help me?
I have Vista as you can see, The XP guides do not help, And from what I've seen for the Vista guides, nothing works..
Thanks guys. :slight_smile:

item.title: Bridging Connections - 360.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Ooh, don’t worry, It’s working now!

Thanks for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Bridging Connections - 360.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Lamsey:

Unshare the wireless connection, bridge the two connections, then share the bridge? Does that work?

How do I unshare it? :3
Forgive me for sounding so noobish.

EDIT.
Ah… ICS. yeah, done that… Thanks, it’s bridging now!

EDIT:
It tests the connection, And it fails at the IP Address… :S

Read full topic

item.title: Bridging Connections - 360.
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
Unshare the wireless connection, bridge the two connections, then share the bridge? Does that work?

Read full topic
